document_data.name: Pavel
document_data.mainbody: '''Pavel''' was a solider of the [[Flaming Fist]] of that fought for the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] and the surrounding lands during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Pavel had dark skin and short gray hair with accompanying beard. He wore [[leather armor]] emblazoned with the logo of the Flaming Fist.
document_data.History: He was among the Flaming Fist soldiers present at the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn when it put to the torch by [[goblin]] and [[drow]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists]] of [[the Absolute]], the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. Pavel joined fellow soldiers [[Ito]], [[Aelis (Flaming Fist)|Aelis]], and Gauntlet [[Yeva]] in their attempt to break through the front entrance of the inn, to rescue Grand Duke [[Ulder Ravengard]] who was believed to be trapped within.
